node.text:
The Raviz Kovalam Sights & Culture Winter Package is on till March 31st, 2020. The package will include stay at the Garden Pavilion or Beach View room, buffet breakfast & dinner, half-day sightseeing, daily in house activities for the entire family and complimentary head or foot massage at the Favourite Kerala Ayurveda & Spa.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
